articles.description: SpaceX has hot-fired the engines of its next Super Heavy booster as it prepared for a second flight test of an integrated Starship-Super Heavy vehicle.
articles.content:
SpaceX hot-fired the engines of its next Super Heavy booster at a newly rebuilt launchpad, which now includes a water-suppression system to help prevent future damage. 
The test, which took place fr… [+1622 chars]
